statements: SELECT * FROM shipping_information WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT item_name, shipping_address FROM shipping_information WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM shipping_information WHERE item_name LIKE '%book%';
SELECT order_id, delivery_status FROM shipping_information ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM shipping_information WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM shipping_information WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT item_name, shipping_address FROM shipping_information WHERE order_id = 12345;
SELECT item_name, delivery_status FROM shipping_information WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM shipping_information ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT item_name) AS total_items FROM shipping_information;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status='delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, item_name FROM shipments WHERE order_id=1001;
SELECT location, update_time FROM tracking_info WHERE shipment_id=5001 ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE order_id=3001 AND delivery_status='shipped';
SELECT * FROM shipments JOIN tracking_info ON shipments.shipment_id = tracking_info.shipment_id WHERE shipments.delivery_status='shipped';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'shipped'
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, item_name, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE order_id = 100
SELECT * FROM tracking_info WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY update_time DESC
SELECT shipment_id, item_name, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'pending' AND order_id > 200
SELECT tracking_id, location, update_time FROM tracking_info WHERE update_time > '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%Chicago%'
SELECT * FROM delivery_status;
SELECT tracking_id, item_name, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_status;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customer;
SELECT company_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM shipping_company;

SELECT delivery_status.tracking_id, customer.customer_name, shipping_company.company_name FROM delivery_status, customer, shipping_company WHERE delivery_status.tracking_id = customer.customer_id AND delivery_status.tracking_id = shipping_company.company_id;
SELECT tracking_id, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_status;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT company_id, company_name, contact_email FROM shipping_company ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_status WHERE status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM shipping_information;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM items WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_status FROM shipping_information WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM shipping_information
SELECT delivery_status, delivery_date FROM shipping_information ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT item_name, description, price FROM items WHERE price > 100
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%St.'
SELECT item_name, price, description FROM items ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;

SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered'
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit'
SELECT tracking_id, location FROM tracking
